forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Patchy drizzle. Partly cloudy, with a low around 59. South southwest wind around 2 mph.

forecast.name: Monday
forecast.detailedForecast: Patchy drizzle before 10am. Sunny. High near 78, with temperatures falling to around 73 in the afternoon. Southwest wind 2 to 10 mph.

weather_report:
As dawn breaks over Downtown San Francisco, a delicate veil of patchy drizzle lingers, softening edges and lending a muted quality to the scene. With the temperature resting at a mild 59 degrees, the air feels cool yet inviting, a gentle embrace cradling those who emerge from the nighttime cocoon. The soft south-southwest winds whisper at a leisurely pace, hinting at the promise of a brighter day ahead. 

By midday, the skies will shed their overcast layers in favor of sunny spells, with a high reaching near 78 degrees before easing back to a comfortable 73 in the afternoon. The marine layer, resting gently along the horizon, will retreat, revealing more of the city’s iconic silhouette against an expansive, clear blue. It’s an excellent opportunity to don light layers—a breathable shirt complemented by a light jacket for the lingering chill of the morning. Perhaps a stroll through the Presidio will entice, where the paths beckon with the fragrance of coastal flora and the distant sound of waves crashing against the shore. A visit to one of the local coffee shops, relishing a warm cup as you watch the world awaken, could also make for a charming interlude.
